I think social media has definitely had an impact on my perception of justice and morality. I've noticed that it's easy to get caught up in the outrage culture and sensationalism, and sometimes I find myself reacting to a news story or opinion without fully understanding the context. But at the same time, I've also seen how social media can be a powerful tool for raising awareness about social justice issues and promoting empathy.

I've been trying to be more mindful of my social media consumption and make an effort to seek out diverse perspectives and nuanced discussions. It's not always easy, but I think it's important to be aware of our own biases and try to engage with others in a thoughtful and respectful way.
